SEARCH
Package Model

Class Transactions

java.lang.Object
Model.Transactions
public class Transactions extends Object
The Transactions class represents the transaction log of the vending machine, which includes the items bought, special items bought, total sales, and inventory details.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Transactions()
    Creates a new Transactions object with default values.

  • Constructor Details

    • Transactions

      public Transactions()
      Creates a new Transactions object with default values. The transaction log is initialized with empty lists of items bought and special items bought, and the starting and ending inventory are set to 0.
